content: {"locationId": "13135", "organizationId": "10287", "name": "St. Paul Presbyterian Church Food Pantry", "address1": "18901 E Hampden Ave", "address2": "", "city": "Aurora", "state": "CO", "zipCode": "80013", "country": null, "phone": "303-693-3434", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://www.stppc.org", "latitude": "39.65357", "longitude": "-104.7672", "foodPrograms": "Food Pantry", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "STPPC Food Pantry is sponsored by St. Paul Presbyterian Church.  The Food Pantry is the biggest mission of our little church. The congregations financially supports the food pantry, provides the space to operate and the volunteers to operate the pantry.  This is a drive thru pantry operating Tuesdays 10 to 12.  A box contains: 1 peanut butter, 1 shelf stable milk, 2 soups, 2 vegetables, 2 beans, 2 chicken, 1 rice, 1 pasta, 1 cereal. During different times of the year, different items supplement the box.  A family of 1-5 receives 1 box, 6-8 receives 2 boxes, and 9 receives 3 boxes. Produce bags are provided on Tuesdays after a Monday pickup from Food Bank of the Rockies.   Our food is purchased through Food Bank of the Rockies. Several area churches donate food and money to our pantry as do neighbors.", "notes": "STPPC Food Pantry is a drive thru pantry.  Pull your car to the east of the front entry, you will be checked in and boxes put in your car.  Currently using Link2Feed.", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Everyday Eats For Adults 60+, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 79, "regionName": "Food Bank of the Rockies", "logoBlobNameSmall": "56c2b2fe-4696-428f-91d3-841bf4970f11.png", "website": "https://www.foodbankrockies.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MT", "offsetHours": "-6", "schedules": ["Tuesday 10:00 AM-12:00 PM (Drive thru pantry)", "Tuesday 10:00 AM-12:00 PM (Drive thru pantry)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
